meanings.definition: Furthest forward in a group or line.
meanings.sent1: The headmost car in the race crossed the finish line first.
meanings.sent2: The headmost student in the line got to the classroom door quickly.
meanings.sent3: The headmost squirrel in the tree was the first to find the acorns.
meanings.sent4: Her headmost position in the marathon made her feel like a champion.
meanings.sent5: The headmost ship in the fleet led the way through the stormy seas.

meanings.sent1: The headmost building in the city skyline was the tallest.
meanings.sent2: The headmost idea in the presentation caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The headmost cake at the party was the biggest and most delicious.
meanings.sent4: Her headmost role in the play made her the star of the show.
meanings.sent5: The headmost rule in the game was crucial for winning.
